PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2004-07512004-06-17,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ND
ActNational Defence Act
PrecisAmendments to the QUEEN'S REGULATIONS AND ORDERS FOR THE CANADIAN FORCES which revise Articles 15.17 and 15.31 by raising the mandatory retirement age from 55 to 60 for those who enlist on or after July 1, 2004, by offering serving members the option of retiring at that age, and by allowing for the release of members of the Regular Force after 30 years of service, regardless of rank, effective July 1, 2004.
AttachmentsAttachment
